channel.title: CVE Feed for inspireui -- MStore API
channel.description: The latest CVEs for inspireui -- MStore API

item.title: CVE-2023-3202|2024-10-22T19:17:21.160Z -- inspireui -- mstore%20api
item.description: The MStore API plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery due to missing nonce validation on the mstore_update_firebase_server_key function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the firebase server key to push notification when order status changed via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
